DOC.brief_title: RCT Post-Suicide Attempt Case Management ( ACTION-J )
DOC.detailed_description: It well know many subject survive suicide attempt make suicide attempt , even medical treatment critical emergency unit . To examine effectiveness continuous follow-up care case manager suicide attempt , randomize , control , multicenter trial J-MISP ( Japanese Multimodal Intervention Trials ) .This research project one strategic research project fund The Japanese Ministry Health , Labor Welfare . In study , J-MISP implement intervention suicide attempter , considerably high-risk group suicide attempt , transport emergency service .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Over 20 year old 2 . Suffering Axis I disorder 3 . Had intent suicide ( confirm 2 time ) 4 . Able understand study provide inform consent 5 . Able interview trial registry psycho education hospital 6 . Able interview assessment continuous followup care case manager hospital 1 . Not suffer Axis I disorder primary diagnosis
